TopicTitle: Does the Saitek X-55 joystick work with Linux?

Articles.Content:
I'm really interested in [this](http://saitek.com/uk/prod/x55.html) and I want to know whether it will work with Ubuntu, seeing as there are only Windows drivers with it. I am aware that I will need to install Advanced Fly By Wire mod.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-23T18:45:20Z" title="07/23/2015 06:45  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 23, 2015</time> by Rocketmaster**
Maybe a bit late, but I can confirm it works. I'm using opensuse and the advanced fly by wire mod.
